Name: Bodrum
Review Text:
Had a super delicious vegan meal. Very healthy, prepared with lots of care and very reasonable in price.
I can recommend this to anyone who is fond of good service, crazy delicious food and a beautiful cosy restaurant.

Name: Bodrum
Review Text: This little restaurant has the most amazing food. All the dishes are homemade and so tasty. It‚Äôs a very cozy place and the owners are such friendly people. Name: Bodrum
Review Text: Me and 4 of my friends have been to this amazing family place second time and I was impressed both times. The service is very friendly, excellent, dishes are based on traditional recipes and refined by the chef to give them a unique touch. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bodrum

Name: Bodrum
Review Text: Hands down one of the best experiences and meals I've had in Amsterdam. Such friendly owners and amazing food, I'd recommend it to everyone.

Name: Bodrum
Review Text: Just perfect! Very cosy, very reasonably priced, amazing recipes that straight up compete with what you'll eat on the mediteranean coast. The owners are super friendly and accomodating. I hate lamb but theirs was absolutely delicious!

Name: Bodrum
Review Text: Very friendly and lovely tasting food. The salad was fresh with a lovely oil on it and the meat was perfect, not greasy at all.

Name: Bodrum
